resources.string: Please select how many of each role you\'d like. \nPress the name of a role to see what it does.
The mafia choose a person to kill every night.
The detectives choose a person to learn about (have their alignment, mafia or civilian, revealed) every night.
The double agents can kill one person and save one person per game.
The bodyguards choose a person to protect from the mafia every night.
When killed, the bombers immediately choose another person to kill.
Civilians don\'t do anything at night.
